DOC.detailed_description: This trial utilize randomize , double-blind , two-period crossover design . At Visit 4 ( Week 0 ) , 5-week diet lead-in/baseline period , subject meet entry criterion randomize one two double-blind treatment sequence , simvastatin/Omacor first simvastatin/placebo first . Each treatment period consist 6 week . After randomization , subject self-administer study drug day evening .
